data.actual_result: The text length is not being properly cut off and is being overlapped by the arrow icon
data.expected_result: Have the text be cut off before the ending of the box
data.short_description: Input/Output devices text in Voice & Video settings not being properly cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - have an input device with a certain text length (e.g. Headset Microphone (Steelseries Arctis 7 Chat) - open discord settings  - open Apps Settings - check Input/Output devices under Voice & Video
